loans.name: José Lorenzo

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 50 años de edad, esta acompañado con un hijo.

Desde la edad de 10 años José se dedica a la agricultura, ya que su papá le enseño a sembrar maíz y maicillo. También desde los 12 años se dedica a cuidar ganado, pues le ayudaba a un amigo y fue así que aprendió a trabajar con bueyes. Debido a la pobreza de su familia José empezó a trabajar desde muy joven. Él se levanta a las 5:00 de la mañana para dirigirse a su trabajo, él camina veinticinco minutos para llegar donde trabaja ocho horas diarias, su sueño es tener algo cuando él ya no pueda trabajar.

José se traslada a otro lugar, para comprar los insumos que necesita. Él viaja en microbús 10 minutos y algunas veces lo lleva con sus bueyes en la carreta y así ahorrarse unos dólares.

Él solicita un préstamo para comprar tres  novillos, para trabajar. Ya que para sembrar se vio en la necesidad de vender los que tenia y desea comprar otros para sacar la cosecha. De esta manera, no tendrá que pagar a otra persona para que le saque su cosecha, ya teniendo sus novillos él lo hará y se ahorrara ese dinero. También él podrá prestar los servicios de acarreo de las cosechas de otras personas. Para brindarle a su familia una mejor condición de vida. El deseo de José es ahorrar lo mas que pueda, para tener que ofrecerle a su familia cuando él ya no este. Y dejarle a su hijo una buena yunta de bueyes, para que trabaje y se gane la vida honradamente.
texts.en:
Señor José is 50 years old and lives with his son.

From the age of 10 José has been a farmer as his father taught him how to plant corn and millet. From the age of 12 he has also taken care of livestock as he used to help a friend and so learned how to work with oxen. As his family was very poor, José started work from an early age. He gets up at 5:00 in the morning to go to work. He walks for 25 minutes to get to work where he works for 8 hours every day. His dream is to have something when he can no longer work.

José travels to buy the supplies he needs. He travels 10 minutes by minibus and sometimes he uses his oxen on the road to get there to save a few dollars.

He is asking for a loan to buy 3 young oxen for work. As he had to sell the ones he had at sowing time, he wants to buy others for the harvest. In this way, he will not need to pay someone else to harvest his crop as having his own young oxen he will do it himself and save himself the money. He will also be able to haul crops for other people and give his family a better standard of living. José wants to save as much as possible to provide for his family when he is gone; and leave his son a good yoke of oxen so that he can work and make an honest living.

loans.use: to buy 3 young oxen.

loans.name: Lisi

texts.es: Lisi, de 27 años, es una mujer joven, soñadora y muy amable. Vive con pareja con quien tiene dos hijos de 8 y 4 años en su casa propia. Ella y su pareja trabajan mucho para así poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. El trabajo de Lisi consiste en la venta de zapatos, sandalias, zapatillas y más, trabaja en forma ambulante en el mercado de su ciudad; asimismo posee un puesto de venta donde su esposa se hacer cargo. Se siente muy a gusto haciendo lo que hace ya que le es retribuido en los buenos ingresos que tiene, pero necesita de alguna ayuda adicional ya que se quiere preparar para la campaña navideña próxima. Le esta yendo bien ya que vende mucho pero a falta de inversión es que no aumenta su capital, tiene planes como ampliar su local.  Este será el primer crédito  con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio, además se compromete en ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mayor cantidad de mercadería, entre las cosas que comprará será sandalias, zapatillas, zapatos y algunos otros productos hasta donde alcance su presupuesto.
texts.en:
27-year-old Lisi is a very kind young woman with dreams.  She lives with her partner and they have two children aged 8 and 4.  They live in their own home.  Lisi and her partner work hard so that they can provide their children with a better quality of life.

Lisi's business is selling shoes, sandals, sneakers, etc.  She works as an itinerant vendor in the town market.  She also has a sales location that her partner runs.  She feels very happy doing what she does because she is rewarded with the good income that she makes.  However, she needs some additional help as she would like to get ready for the upcoming Christmas season.  Her business is doing well as she sells a lot but, owing to a lack of investment, she cannot increase her capital.  She has plans to expand her sales premises.

This will be Lisi's first loan from MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support as this will make her feel sure of making progress in her business.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  Lisi will use the sum she has requested to buy a larger quantity of merchandise.  She will buy sandals, sneakers, shoes and some other products so far as her budget reaches.

loans.use: to buy more shoes, sandals and sneakers

loans.name: Olga Lucía

texts.es:
Desde hace algunos años Olga se dedica a la venta de mercancía por catálogo lo que le permite trabajar desde su casa y dedicarse a los oficios propios del hogar así como a pequeño hijo, así esta emprendedora también contribuye a cubrir los gastos del hogar. 

Actualmente necesita de un préstamo para pagar algunas facturas pendientes y comprar mercancía para el mes de diciembre pues es una época en la que necesita mayor cantidad de productos.
texts.en:
Olga has been selling merchandise through catalogs for some years.  This allows her to work from home and take care of her housework, as well as her young son.  In this way, this entrepreneur contributes towards covering her household expenses.

Olga currently needs a loan to pay some pending bills and to buy merchandise for the month of December as this is a time of year when she needs a larger quantity of products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and pay some bills

loans.name: Yadira Monserrate

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Los Jazmines  de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Mujer y Fortaleza.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Yadira, tiene 40 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 16, 10 y 3 años  de edad, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. Su marido es decorador.

Ella tiene un negocio en el centro de la ciudad en el cual vende una gran variedad de artículos, allí sus clientes pueden conseguir gafas, relojes, calculadoras, electrodomésticos en general, entre otras cosas, trabaja todos los días desde las 08h00 hasta las 18h00, trabaja en unión y compañía de sus familiares ya que este es un negocio familiar que lo heredaron de sus padres. Lleva en este negocio 15 años y les va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar ventiladores, calculadoras, gafas, relojes, entre otras cosas. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su meta es tener otro local.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the 'Mujer y Fortaleza' (Woman and Strength) community bank meet in Los Jazmines district, in the city of Portoviejo.  Portoviejo is the capital of Manabí province and has been known for many years as the 'City of the Royal Tamarind Trees'.

Here we meet 40-year-old Yadira who lives with her common-law husband.  The couple have three children aged 16, 10 and 3.  Her two eldest children are in school.  Her husband is a decorator.

Yadira has a business in the city center where she sells a large range of items.  There her customers can buy glasses, watches, calculators, general electrical appliances and other products.  She works every day, from 8.00am to 6.00pm.  She works with her family members as this is a family business which they inherited from their parents.  She has been in this business for 15 years and it is doing very well.

Yadira will use this loan to buy fans, calculators, glasses, watches and other products.  She has been a member of her community bank from the beginning and she likes it because of the help that she receives from the loans.  Her goal is to have another sales location.

loans.use: to buy fans, calculators, glasses, watches, etc.

loans.name: Walter Milton

texts.es: Walter, está iniciando nuevamente los cultivos agrícolas, por eso solicita un préstamo, comprando 4 sacos de abono, con este dinero. Walter ha sabido salir adelante manejando muy bien los préstamos, aumentando la productividad en sus cultivos. La condición económica de él y su familia han mejorado.
texts.en: Walter is sowing his crops again.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan.  He will use the money to buy four sacks of fertilizer.  Walter has known how to make progress, handling his loans very well and increasing the productivity of his crops.  His own financial situation, and that of his family, have improved.

loans.use: to buy four sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
Maria Luisa pertenece al banco comunal “Del Futuro del Manu” y las reuniones de los socios del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios. 

Maria Luisa tiene 36 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo y desde hace 23 años que radica en la ciudad de Salvación. 

Maria Luisa tiene un local de hospedaje, una tienda de abarrotes y un restaurante. Ya son varios años que se dedica a los negocios y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  

En esta oportunidad Maria Luisa requiere el préstamo para implementar el local de hospedaje desea comprar toallas, jaboncillos, sabanas y otras cosas más.
 
Maria Luisa agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Maria Luisa belongs to the communal bank “Del Futuro del Manu”. The members meet every 30 days in the city of Salvación in the province of Manu and department of Madre de Dios. 

Maria Luisa is 36 years old and is in a common-law marriage from which she has 4 children. She was born in the city of Paucartambo and has lived for the past 23 years in the city of Salvacion.

Maria Luisa has a guesthouse, a grocery store and a restaurant. She has had these businesses for several years and she is doing very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

On this occasion, Maria Luisa needs a loan to buy towels, small soapbars, sheets and other things necessary to use the premises for paying guests.
 
Maria Luisa is grateful for and values the loan and agrees to make her monthly repayments.

loans.use: to buy towels, small soapbars, sheets and other things necessary to use the premises for paying guests.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a compressor.

loans.name: Lita

texts.es: Lita, de 34 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy responsables. Vive con su pareja con quien tiene cuatro hijos de 17, 14, 13 años y el menor de 7 meses en su casa propia, en donde comparten las alegrías y las tristezas todos juntos. Lita y su pareja trabajan mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. El trabajo de Lita consiste en la crianza de animales de corral, posee un pequeño galpón de pollos en donde esta criando 200 unidades de pollos. Su conviviente trabaja en varias actividades y no tiene un ingresos fijo al mes, es por eso que ella decidió apoyar en los ingresos del hogar. Así se inicio con este pequeño proyecto que empezó como un pequeño pasatiempo, ahora significa para ella una forma de vida, ella trabaja sola, pero en algunas ocasiones tiene la ayuda de sus hijos los mayores. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le brinda independencia y facilidad de disponer de su propio horario, le esta yendo bien y espera poder seguir así, tiene como planes el de seguir creciendo y poner algunos galpones más. Este será el tercer crédito con la institución MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con sus cuotas, como en el anterior crédito que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos los integrantes son personas que son muy responsables y muy solidarios. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más pollitos, vacunas, vitaminas, alimentos balanceados y algunos materiales que necesita implementar para seguir con la crianza de pollos.
texts.en: Lita is 34 years old and is a good woman , kind and very responsible. She lives with her partner with whom she has 4 chldren aged 17, 14 and 13 years and 7 months. They live in their own house where they share the joys and sorrows of life together. Lita and her partner work hard to give their children a better quality of life. Lita raises poultry. She has a small chicken shed where she is raising 200 chickens. Her partner works at various jobs and does not have a fixed monthly income. This is why she decided to help with the household expenses. This is how she started this small project which initially began as a small hobby. Now, it is a way of life for her. She works alone but on occasion her older children help her. What she likes about her work is that it gives her independence and allows her to manage her own time. She is doing well and hopes to continue doing so. She plans on growing her business and setting up a few more chicken sheds. This will be her 3rd loan with MFP. She is very happy knowing that she will have financial support as in this way she will feel secure moving forwards with her business. On the other hand, she agrees once again to make her repayments, as she did with the previous loan she had. She also likes being a part of her communal bank as all the members are very responsible and very supportive people. With the amount requested, she will buy more chicks, vaccines, vitamins, balanced feed and a few materials she needs to continue raising chickens.

loans.use: to buy chicks, vaccines, vitamins, feed and other materials for her chicken shed.

loans.name: Herney De Jesus

texts.es:
Herney desde hace 5 años monto su negocio de legumbrería donde ofrece unas excelentes frutas y verduras a sus clientes, con este negocios el consigue el sustento diario para su familia que está conformada por su compañera y sus dos hijos.

El se sueña mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, además de poder ofrecerles un futuro mejor a su hijos, para esto el quiere ampliar su negocio y adecuarlo para así sus clientes se sientan mas cómodos y mayor variedad.
texts.en:
5 years ago Herney established his greengrocer business which offers excellent fruit and vegetables to his customers. Through this business he is able to provide for his family, which consists of his partner and two children.  

Herney dreams of improving the quality of life for his family and wants to offer a better future for his children. He wants to expand and adapt his business so that his customers feel more comfortable and have more variety to choose from.

loans.use: to purchase fruit, vegetables and provisions to expand his business, as well as shelves, chairs and tables.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, de 33 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de Estelí, de oficio comerciante  dueño de una pulperia, es padre de tres hijos de 13, 10 y 1 año respectivamente. Sus hijos mayores están estudiando su esposa es ama de casa. El empezó este  negocio con capital propio, no tenia mucho que ofrecer, fueron pocos productos que vendía, vio la necesidad de invertir mas solicito un préstamo en otros lugares así fue levantando su pulpería, además el trabaja perforando hojas de tabaco en una  fabrica de puros estos son segundos ingresos, pues es por sus hijos que el se esfuerza cada  día para que no les falte nada y se preparen con estudios ya que  el solo logro cursar  hasta el tercer grado de la primaria no tuvo nadie quien lo apoyara y no quiere que eso le suceda a sus hijos. 
El requiere el préstamo para surtir su pulpería de productos tales como granos básicos, enlatados, papel higiénico, gaseosas, carne, pollo, snacks, dulces, detergentes, ambientadores, aceite, leche, huevos. Con esta inversión le ayudara a surtir su negocio de productos mas demandados por  sus clientes, mejorar sus ingresos. Una de sus expectativas es comprar2 estantes y vitrinas para exhibir sus productos e ir mejorando su pulpería poco a poco que cumpla con las necesidades de su vecindario
texts.en:
33-year-old Víctor is originally from the city of Estelí.  He owns a grocery store and is the father of three children who are 13, 10 and 1.  His older children are in school and his wife is a housewife.  Víctor started this business with his own capital.  At first, he didn't have much to offer and sold few products.  He saw the need to invest some more in his business and so requested a loan.  In this way, he gradually improved his grocery store.  Víctor also works perforating sheets of tobacco in a cigar factory which makes him a second income.  He works hard every day for his children, so that they don't want for anything and so that they can prepare themselves with a good education as Víctor himself was only able to study up to the third year of elementary school because he didn't have anybody to support him.  He does not want this to happen to his children.

Víctor needs this loan to stock his grocery store with products such as basic grains, canned goods, toilet paper, soda, meat, chicken, snacks, candies, detergents, air fresheners, oil, milk and eggs.  This investment will help him to stock his business with the products which are in most demand with his customers, and improve his income.  One of his hopes is to buy shelves and cabinets in which to display his products.  He would like to continue gradually improving his grocery store and meet the needs of his neighbors.

loans.use: to buy products such as basic grains, canned goods, toilet paper, soda, meat, chicken, snacks, candies, detergents, air fresheners, oil, milk and eggs

loans.name: Fe Y Amor 2 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Altagracia is the coordinator of Fe y Amor 2 & 5 (Faith and Love). This group is made up of ten micro-entrepreneur women, and it is located in the city of La Romana, a rural area of the country dedicated to the harvest of sugar cane, in a batey founded for sugar cane workers, especially for Haitians.

Altagracia lives with her long-term partner and her six children. She says that her most important challenge is to have a house, and stop paying rent, and her most favorite thing to do is to eat; she loves to eat. She is running a miscellaneous sales business where she sells chicken, charcoal, and clothes. She has a small stand by her house where she sells the chicken and the charcoal, especially in the morning, and in the afternoon she sells the clothes by walking in her and other communities. With this loan, she is planning to buy many pounds of chicken, bags of charcoal, and different clothing. 

She is excited to receive her third loan with Esperanza. She has been part of this group for almost a year, and with each loan she has been able to improve her business. With her business profits, she will reinvest in her business and save. Altagracia thanks all of you for your support of her business and her group.

loans.use: to buy pounds of chicken, charcoal, and clothes.

loans.name: Carlos Gilbel

texts.es:
Carlos, necesita incrementar su negocio, tiene ideas de comprar abono y dos terneros, el primer elemento le servirá para fortalecer los cultivos, los terneros para aumentar su ganado, los proyectos de Carlos es que a través de los préstamo pueda crecer en su actividad agropecuaria.
Los anteriores préstamos le han servido para mejorar la condición de su familia, siendo ahora más provechosas que antes.
texts.en: Carlos needs to expand his business. He plans to buy organic fertilizer and two calves.  The fertilizer will help him to improve his crops, and the calves will increase his livestock.  Through this loan, Carlos plans to grow his agricultural business.  His previous loans helped him to improve his family's living conditions, as his business is now more profitable.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and two calves

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise: clothing and shoes

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, solicita nuevamente un préstamo, porque siente el deseo de incrementarlo, comprara pollo, carne, maíz, condimentos, con esta inversión espera dar continuidad al crecimiento del negocio, y ofrecer a los clientes una mejor una atención.
Las condiciones económicas de María y de su familia, han mejorado, así como los clientes están más satisfechos con la prosperidad del negocio.
texts.en:
Maria is requesting a new loan because she wants to expand her business.  She will buy chicken, meat, corn and condiments.  With this investment she hopes to be able to continue to grow her business and offer her customers better service.

The economic situation of Mary and her family has improved, and her customers are very satisfied with her more prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy chicken, meat, corn, and condiments for her business

loans.name: Roxana De Jesus

texts.es: Roxana, se ha decidido a un nuevo crédito, porque quiere seguir invirtiendo en comprar más mercadería como: camisas, pantalones, blusas, ropa interior, el objetivo de ella es incrementar en las ventas los ingresos y para ofrecerles variedad a sus clientes. Los prestamos q obtuvo anteriormente le ayudo a mejorar a sus ventas, esto le ayudo a mejorar económicamente y mejorar en su vida familiar.
texts.en: Roxana has decide don a new loan because she wants to continue investing in purchasing merchandise like shirts, pants, blouses and underwear; her goal is to increase income from sales and offer variety to her customers.  The loans she obtained previously helped her improve sales which helped her to improve economically and to improve her family life.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: María Isaura

texts.es:
Comprar un vehículo para transportar los productos de su panadería es el sueño de María Isaura quien desde hace cuatro años tiene una panadería en Medellín, sus panes son apetecidos en el sector debido a su sabor y frescura. 

Actualmente esta emprendedora necesita de un préstamo para comprar insumos en mayores cantidades lo que le permitirá comprarlos a menor precio para incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en: To be able to purchase a vehicle to transport her bakery goods is Maria's dream.  For 4 years she has had a bakery in Medellin,  where her delicious and freshly baked breads and pastries are in great demand.   This enterprising businesswoman is requesting the loan to purchase ingredients in greater quantities and at lower prices, which will enable her to increase her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her bakery in greater quantities and at lower prices.

loans.name: Cruz Orfelia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Constructoras Del Éxito, esta ciudad se la conoce desde hace mucho con el nombre de Ciudad Del Valle por estar encerrada por muchos cerros que rodean la urbe.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Cruz, tiene 65 años de edad, está separada pero  de esta relación tuvo tres hijos, pero uno de ellos falleció hace unos años atrás, los dos que aun están vivos son mayores e independientes, pero viven cerca de su casa.

Ella para ganarse el sustento diario sin tener que pedirle a nadie para sus cosas  tiene un pequeño negocio (Bar) en su casa en la cual vende golosinas, helados, sodas, además de corviches, empanadas y jugos naturales, ella trabaja todos los días en su negocio y lleva 20 años en el mismo, fue con este negocio que pudo sacar adelante  a sus hijos dándoles lo mejor a punta de esfuerzo para que estos fueran personas de bien.

Este crédito es para comprar sodas, golosinas, helados y víveres para sus bocadillos. Lleva seis ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la rapidez para recibir los créditos.
 
Su sueño  tener salud para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
The “Constructoras Del Éxito” (Success Builders) communal bank meets every fifteen days in the city of Portoviejo known for many years as “Ciudad Del Valle” (City of the Valley) because the city is surrounded by many hills.

We met Cruz, 65, here.  She’s separated but had three children although one of them died a few years ago.  The two remaining ones are adult and independent but live near her house.

To earn her daily support without having to ask anyone for things, she has a small snack bar at home where she sells snacks, ice-cream, soft-drinks and “corviches” [deep-fried plantain dough stuffed with fish and spices], turnovers, fruit juices.  She works every day and has been in business 20 years.  It was with this business that she was able to raise her children giving them the best thanks to effort so that they would become upstanding citizens.

This loan is to buy soft-drinks, snacks, ice-cream and foodstuffs for her fast food items.  She’s been in the communal bank for six cycles and she likes it because of the speed with which loans are granted.  Her dream is to stay healthy to continue working.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, snacks, ice-cream and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Ada Maria

texts.es: Ada, está solicitando otro préstamo, porque quiere surtir el negocio de mercadería como: calzado para niños, damas y caballeros, sandalias, yinas, el objetivo de ella es tener más variedad para ofrecerles a sus clientes. Los financiamientos anteriores le ayudaron a fortalecer su negocio y ha podido comprar nuevos estilos y variedad, este avance le ha servido para mejorar lo económico a su familia.
texts.en: Ada is requesting another loan so that she can increase her inventory with shoes and sandals for children, women and men.  She wants to have more variety to offer to her customers.   Her previous loans helped her to grow her business and purchase new styles.  This loan will help her improve the economic situation for her family.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of shoes and sandals for children, women and men.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plates, jugs, pitchers, trash receptacles, buckets.

loans.name: María Monserrate

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Constructoras Del Éxito, esta ciudad se la conoce desde hace mucho con el nombre de Ciudad Del Valle por estar encerrada por muchos cerros que rodean la urbe.

Aquí conocimos a María, tiene 21 años  de edad, está soltera y estudia el quinto semestre de Administración de Empresas en una Universidad de Manabí. Ella vive en casa de sus padres. Lleva en el Banco Comunal seis ciclos y le gusta por las facilidades para conseguir los créditos.

Es una preciosa jovencita que además de ser muy dedicada a sus estudios también se dedica al comercio, ella vende ropa por catalogo y  productos de Avon  (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los  días ya que vende por su casa y también en la universidad donde estudia,  deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene cuatro años que se dedica a esta actividad y es con esto que se ayuda para seguir con sus estudios.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa.

Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios  y ser una gran empresaria.
texts.en:
The “Constructoras Del Éxito” (Success Builders) communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Portoviejo known for many years as “Ciudad Del Valle” (City of the Valley) because the city is surrounded by many hills.

We met María, 21, here.  She’s single and studying fifth semester of Business Administration at a university in Manabí.  She lives with her parents and has been in the communal bank for six cycles; she likes it because of the ease in getting loans.

She is a lovely young lady who  besides being dedicated to her studies is also a merchant; she sells clothes via catalogue and Avon brand products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and women’s accessories).  She works every day because she sells both at home and also at the university she attends.  She sells on credit and collects weekly.  She’s been in business four years and this is how she helps to pay her school costs. 

This loan is to buy perfume, cream, cosmetics and clothes.  Her dream is to finish her schooling and become a great businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and clothes.

loans.name: Loyda

texts.es: Loyda, de 27 años, es una mujer buena y muy amable. Vive con su pareja con quien tiene cuatro hijos de 14, 8, 4 años y el menor de 6 meses en su casa propia. El trabajo de Loyda consiste en la venta de ropa, este trabajo lo realiza en su casa, en las calles, entre sus amigos, vecinos y familiares. Se inicio en este trabajo hace ya tres años, al ver la necesidad de tener un ingreso adicional a la economía de su hogar, y desde entonces lo hizo así. Le esta yendo bien ya que gana un buen porcentaje en sus ventas. Antes de empezar con este trabajo siempre tenían el problema de no tener dinero suficiente para satisfacer las necesidades de su familia, así que decidió que ella también podría traer ingreso esconómicos. Espera que su trabajo le siga yendo bien como hasta ahora, ya que tiene como deseo el de seguir creciendo y empezar a vender por docenas a sus fieles clientes. Este será el sexto crédito con la institución MFP, por lo que esta muy entusiasmada de tener un apoyo para seguir trabajando y aumentar su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería de ropa y otros productos más para su negocio, esta queriendo implementar su negocio con nuevos productos para esperar las fiesta de fin de año con nuevos productos.
texts.en:
Loyda is 27 years old.  She is a very friendly and kind woman.  She lives in her own house with her partner with whom she has four children ages 14, 8, 4 and 6 months.  Loyda sells clothing to her friends, neighbors, and family out of her house and on the streets for a living.  She started this business 3 years ago because she realized that they needed additional household income.  Things have been going well for her since she takes home a good percentage of her sales.  Before she started this business, they never had enough money to cover the family's necessities and this his how she decided that she also would have to bring in an income.   She hopes that her business will continue doing well, as it has until now, as she wants to continue to grow and start selling in bulk to her loyal customers.

This will be her sixth loan with MFP and she is very excited to have the support so she can continue working and also increase her working capital.  With the amount requested, she will buy clothing and other products for her business.  She is wanting to introduce new products into her business for the end of the year holiday celebrations.

loans.use: purchase more clothing.

loans.name: Amparo Del Carmen

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Constructoras Del Éxito, esta ciudad se la conoce desde hace mucho con el nombre de Ciudad Del Valle por estar encerrada por muchos cerros que rodean la urbe.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Amparo, tiene 36 años de edad, está separada pero de esa relación tiene  5 hijos de 17, 15, 12, 11 y 9 años de edad, los cuatro mayores estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela. 

Ella para ganarse la vida y con esto sacar adelante a sus hijos  se dedica al  negocio de compra y venta de arroz,  trabaja todos los días. Ella contrata un carro que le lleva hasta una piladora de arroz en Charapoto donde compra el arroz a mas bajo precio, luego se dirige a Portoviejo donde tiene sus clientes a quienes les entrega por quintales o por saquillos de 25 libras, sus hijos le ayuda en su negocio, lleva 6 años dedicada a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar arroz y así seguir adelante con su negocio. Lleva 5 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos a mejorado sus situación económica.
 
Su sueño es tener local para guardar su mercadería.
texts.en:
The “Constructoras Del Éxito” (Success Builders) communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Portoviejo known for many years as “Ciudad Del Valle” (City of the Valley) because the city is surrounded by many hills.

We met Amparo, 36, here.  She’s separated but has five children who are 17, 15, 12, 11 and 9 years old.  The four oldest are in secondary school and the youngest goes to elementary school.

To earn a living and support her children she is a rice merchant.  She works every day.  She hires a car that takes her to a rice miller in Charapoto where she buys the rice at a lower price.  She then heads for Portoviejo where her customers are located and she sells by the quintal or in 25-pound sacks.  Her children help her with her business and she’s been in business six years; she does very well.

This loan is to buy rice to stay in business.  She’s been in the communal bank for five years and likes it because thanks to the loans she’s improved her economic situation. Her dream is to have a locale to store her merchandise in.

loans.use: to buy rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, beans and instant soups.

loans.name: Rosa Albina

texts.es:
La señora Rosa esta muy feliz de poder volver a acceder a un credito, ahora necesira el credito para comprar cascara de soya para su ganado de vacas que tiene, ella desea aprovechar la oporunidad de poder comprar de un camion que le distribuira a un precio mas economico.
Ella esta aumentado la produccion de sus productos que son los quesillos, pues el alimento que les compra ayuda a las vacas a segregar mas leche cruda. Asi logra vender mas producto y generar mas ingreso, por lo que expresa su felicidad y agradecimiento a todas las personas que confiaron en ella.
texts.en:
Rosa is very happy to be able to access a loan once again.  She needs the loan now to buy soy husks for her cattle.  She wants to avail herself of the opportunity to buy from a truck that will sell at a more affordable price.  

She is increasing production of her products which are cheeses because the feed she buys helps her cows to produce more raw milk so she’s able to sell more product and generate higher income.  Because of this she expresses her happiness and gratitude to all the people who trusted her.

loans.use: to buy soy husks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase rice, oil, churros, sweets, instant soups, and instant coffee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase music and video compact discs.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepción, esta decido por un nuevo préstamo, ya que necesita comprar insumos agrícolas para continuar con los cultivos, además que recibió buena atención, por el momento su compra será en abono, herbicidas, pago de mozos, para dar el mantenimiento necesario al cultivo.
El logro comprar de su préstamo anterior los productos agrícolas, ayudando por medio de la cosecha a su familia, gracias a Dios todo el proceso fue un éxito, no ha tenido cambios malos y su familia goza de buena salud.
texts.en:
Concepción has decided to request a new loan. He needs to purchase farm supplies to continue with his crops. In addition, he has received good attention. At this time, he will purchase labor, fertilizer and herbicides for the necessary maintenance of his crops. 
With the previous loan, he was able to purchase farm supplies which helped his harvest and family. Thanks to God, it was a success. There were no bad changes and his family is in good health.

loans.use: purchase labor, fertilizers and herbicides.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tile, cement and sand.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es:
El señor Armando, Tiene 51 años de edad, es originario de La Esperanza, Intibucá donde ha vivido desde su niñez. 
Tiene casa propia por lo que demuestra buena estabilidad domiciliaria, es casado y padre de tres hijos (dos mujeres y un varón) los tres ya no dependen económicamente de él,  pero tiene dos nietos que viven en su casa ya que su hija reside en fuera del país. 
Su negocio consiste en el transporte urbano de personas, él posee más de 30 años de experiencia, es una persona reconocida en la comunidad por tener buenos principios morales, en ODEF ha demostrado un buen comportamiento de pago en los préstamos anteriores.
En esta fecha solicita un crédito para reparación de la unidad de transporte ya que por el mal estado de la calles se le arruino, la cantidad que necesita es de  22,000 Lempiras.
Su sueño es comprar una unidad de transporte nueva para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Armando, 51, is from La Esperanza, Intibucá where he’s lived since childhood.  He owns his house which indicates housing stability.  He’s married and the father of three children (two girls and one boy); all three no longer depend on him economically but he has two grandchildren that live in his house since his daughter lives abroad.

His business consists in urban passenger transport.  He has more than 30 years’ experience.  He is a person known in his community for having good moral principles.  In ODEF he has shown good payment behavior with previous loans.

On this date he’s asking for a loan to repair his bus because the poor state of the roads has damaged it.  The amount he needs is 22,000 Lempiras.  His dream is to buy a new bus to provide better passenger service and earn higher income.

loans.use: to repair his bus.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, chicken, meat, beans, condiments and oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil, condiments, meat and fried pork.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 42 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy responsable, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene cuatro hijos de 10, 18, 7 años y el menor de 7 meses, todos ellos viven en su casa propia desde donde viven la ilusión de brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. El trabajo de María consiste en el transporte de carga y pasajero dentro de la ciudad. Pero ella no es la que se dedica a manejar los vehículos, para esto ella cuenta con la ayuda de su hijo, quien maneja el carro, además posee una mototaxi el cual lo da a un chofer que se encarga de trabajar a diario y pagar una suma en forma de alquiler. Ella desde muy temprano esta en su casa para iniciar el día dando al chofer el moto taxi y a su hijo el carro. Lleva dos años en este negocio, permitiéndole tener tiempo disponible para estar a lado de su familia y poder brindarles los cuidados necesarios. Además tiene un buen ingreso sin hacer mucho esfuerzo, por otro lado esta muy entusiasmada en poder comprar otro vehiculo más para así aumentar sus ingresos. Este será su crédito número cinco con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus proyectos, por otro lado se compromete en seguir siendo la cliente puntual y muy responsable como fue hasta ahora. Con el monto solicitado, comprará materiales para iniciar un nuevo proyecto que es el de costura e iniciará cosiendo sabanas, cubrecamas, fundas y más.
texts.en:
María, 42, is a good, kind, very responsible woman.  She has a spouse and four children who are 10, 18, and 7 years old and the baby that’s 7 months old.  They all live together in her own house with the hopes of providing a better quality of life for her family.

María’s work consists in transporting cargo and passengers within the city.  But she’s not the one that actually drives the vehicles.  For that she has her son’s support; he drives the car.  She also has a mototaxi that a driver operates and pays her a daily rental fee.  She’s at home very early in the morning to start her day giving the mototaxi to the driver and the car to her son.  She’s been in this business two years which has given her time to spend with her family and to provide them with the necessary care.  Besides, she has a source of income that requires very little effort on her part.  On the other hand, she’s excited to be able to buy another vehicle to increase her income.

This will be her 5th MFP loan and she hopes for your support to continue with her projects.  She commits to continue being punctual and very responsible like she’s been to date.  She will use the requested amount to buy materials to start a new project which is sewing; she will sew sheets, bedspreads, pillow cases and more.

loans.use: to buy sheets, bedspreads and pillow cases.

loans.name: Mariana Del Jesús

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte (Portoviejo) se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal La Unión Hace La Fuerza. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Mariana, tiene 47 años de edad, es madre soltera de un  hijo el mismo que ya es mayor de edad  pero  aun vive en su casa con su mujer y su pequeño hijo.
 
Ella tiene un pequeño negocio en su casa el cual consiste en  preparar y vender bocadillos, hamburguesas y dulces de muchas formas y sabores, trabaja todos los días desde las 9h00  hasta las 16h00, ella vende en su casa al menudeo y al por mayor a comerciantes que llegan a comprar sus productos para luego llevarlos a vender a otros lugares. Lleva más de 20 años e este negocio y esto le ayudo a sacar adelante a su hijo.
 
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para la preparación de los productos que ella vende. Es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y le gusta por los créditos  que le ayudan mucho en su negocio. 
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante y tener un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
In Rocafuerte Canton (Portoviejo) the members of the “La Unión Hace La Fuerza” (Unity Makes Strength) communal bank meet every two weeks.  This place is known for the delicious sweets the locals make that are famous nation-wide.

We met Mariana, 47, here.  She’s a single mother of a son who is an adult now but still lives at home with his wife and small son.

She has a small home-based business consisting in preparing snacks, hamburgers and sweets of various shapes and flavors to sell.  She works every day from 9am until 4pm.  She sells at home at retail and also at wholesale to merchants that come by her house to buy and then take her products to other places to sell.  She’s been in this business over 20 years and it has allowed her to raise her son.

This loan is to buy foodstuffs for the preparation of the products she sells.  She’s a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because the loans help her in her business very much.  Her dreams are to continue moving forward and to have a larger business.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs.

loans.name: María Agustina

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte (Portoviejo) se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal La Unión Hace La Fuerza. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.

Aquí conocimos a la señora María, Tiene 47 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual  y tiene dos hijas de 10 y 7  años las mismas que estudian en escuela.  Su marido es comerciante.

Ella tiene un pequeño local en su casa donde  se dedica a la preparación y  venta de comidas rápidas como panes de almidón, corviches, tortas de choclo, empanadas además de café, gaseosas y otros, trabaja todos los días desde las 7h00 hasta las 20h00.  Lleva en este negocio más de 15 años en los cuales le ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar víveres para preparar los alimentos, café, gaseosas, etc. lleva en el Banco Comunal 11 años y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido salir de situaciones muy difíciles en su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa propia ya que vive en la casa de sus suegros.
texts.en:
In Rocafuerte Canton (Portoviejo) the members of the “La Unión Hace La Fuerza” (Unity Makes Strength) communal bank meet every two weeks.  This place is known for the delicious sweets the locals make that are renowned nation-wide.

We met María here.  She’s 47 years old and is in a common law relationship and has two daughters who are 10 and 7 years old and are going to school.  Her husband’s a merchant.

She has a small space in her house that she uses to prepare and sell fast food like bread, deep fried plantain dough stuffed with fish, potato cakes, turnovers as well as coffee, soft-drinks and others.  She works every day from 7am until 8pm.  She’s been in business more than 15 years and has done very well.

She will use the loan to buy foodstuffs to prepare the food, coffee, soft-drinks, etc.  She’s been in the communal bank 11 years and likes it because the loans have helped her get through very difficult situations in her business.  Her dream is to have her own house since she currently lives with her in-laws.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs, coffee, soft-drinks, etc.

loans.name: Lady

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte (Portoviejo) se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal La Unión Hace La Fuerza. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país.
P>
En este lugar encontramos a la señora Lady, tiene 67 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos, ya todos mayores de edad e independientes, con ella vive un nieto el cual tiene 11 años que está en escuela y es como su hijo ya que lo crio desde pequeñito. Su marido es jubilado.

Se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida, ella todos los días  prepara almuerzos una parte son para entregar ya que tiene contratos con ciertos lugares donde entrega sus deliciosos platos y también vende en su casa donde adecuo un local para que sus clientes lleguen  a degustar su comida la cual prepara de la forma más natural posible por la salud de sus clientes, ella  también prepara comida y bocadillos para eventos y todo tipo de compromisos sociales, trabaja con la ayuda de una señora a la cual le paga un sueldo semanal. Lleva más de 25 años con su negocio y sus clientes la prefieren por su comida saludable y deliciosa.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros  víveres para la preparación de los alimentos.  Está en el Banco Comunal casi desde el inicio y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan a través de los créditos para seguir adelante.
 
Su sueño es que su negocio sea más grande.
texts.en:
In Rocafuerte Canton (Portoviejo) the members of the “La Unión Hace La Fuerza” (Unity Makes Strength) communal bank meet every two weeks.  This place is known for the delicious sweets the locals make that are famous nation-wide.

We met Lady, 67, here.  She’s married and has four children who are all independent adults now.  An 11-year-old grandson who is like her own child since she’s had him since he was a baby lives with her and is going to school.  Her husband is retired.

She prepares food to sell.  She makes lunches daily part of which are for delivery because she has contracts in certain places for her delicious meals and others she sells from home where she equipped a space where her customers can come by to enjoy the food she prepares in the most natural way possible for her customers’ health.  She also prepares food and canapés for social events and for all kinds of social affairs.  She works with the help of a lady that she pays a weekly salary to.  She’s been in business more than 25 years and her customers prefer her delicious, healthful food.

She will use this loan to buy rice, meat, fish and other foodstuffs to prepare her meals.  She’s been in the communal bank almost from the beginning and she likes it because of the help they give to get ahead through the loans.  Her dream is that her business is larger.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, fish and other foodstuffs.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina, D. 65 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy responsable. Esta casada y tiene hijos que ya son mayores e independientes. Tiene una casa propia en donD. vive a lado D. su esposo con quien pasa sus días D. alegrías y trabajan mucho pues ellos desean brindarse lo mejor entre si. El trabajo D. Marina, consistirá en la venta D. comidas al paso, ella converso con su vecino y le pidió que pueda vender en la esquina D. su casa y le cedieron el espacio. Ahora sale por las noches a vender salchipapas, salchipollos, pollos broaster, y otros productos. Sabe que todo trabajo con mucho esfuerzo siempre sale bien, ahora tiene en mente hacer crecer su negocio en la venta D. comida. Este será el segundo crédito con la institución MFP, por ello espera D. su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes, asimismo se compromete una vez más en cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado, comprará ingredientes como arroz, pollo, papas y mas, además D. algunos implementos D. cocina para así poder iniciar con su nuevo proyecto.
texts.en:
Marina, 65, is a good, kind and very responsible woman. She’s married and has children who are all independent adults now.  She owns her house where she lives with her husband spending cheerful days; they work hard because they want to give each other the best.

Marina’s work consists in selling fast food.  She spoke with her neighbor and asked if she could sell from his house’s corner and they ceded the space to her.  Now, she goes out nightly to sell salchipapas [fried potatoes with fried sausage], salchipollos [fried potatoes with fried chicken], and Broaster-style chicken and other products.  She knows that any job will turn out well with effort.  Her plan now is to make her food sales business grow.

This will be her 2nd MFP loan and she hopes for your collaboration so that her plans can gel.  She also promises to once again make her installment payments.  She will use the requested amount to buy ingredients like rice, chicken, potatoes and more as well as some kitchen tools to start her new project.

loans.use: to buy rice, chicken and potatoes as well as kitchen tools.

loans.name: Alexandra Angelita

texts.es:
La Señora Alexandra es socia del banco comunal Buscando el Éxito, vive por un sector muy reconocido de la ciudad de Cuenca,  esta ciudad es encantadora por su mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su variedad en su gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños, su gente es muy cálida y amable, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Alexandra tiene 36 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos  de 16, 13 y 5 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia un curso para ser disc-jockey, su segundo hijo estudia en el colegio y su ultimo hijo en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión carpintero y labora en su taller, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

La Señora. Alexandra se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y a cuidar de sus hijos. Los fines de semana vende comida rápida en un kiosco que es de su propiedad, en esta actividad  trabaja hace 7 años.
 
Este es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y  lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para su negocio y en el arreglo de su kiosco.
 
Su meta es de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Alexandra’s a member of the “Buscando el Éxito” (Seeking Success) communal bank.  She lives in a very well-known sector of the city of Cuenca.  This city is enchanting because of the mix of colonial and modern, its varied cuisine that captivates the palates of natives and foreigners alike and its warm and kind residents that maintain the culture and traditions of its peoples.

Alexandra is 36 years old, married and has three children who are 16, 13 and 5 years old.  Her oldest is taking a course to become a disc-jockey, her second son is in secondary school and her youngest goes to the little local elementary school.  Her husband is a carpenter by profession and works in his shop.  They do not own a house, they are renters.

Alexandra does the household chores and cares for her children.  On weekends, however, she sells fast food in a kiosk she owns; she’s been in business seven years.

This is her second loan with the communal bank and she’ll use it to buy foodstuffs for her business and to make repairs to the kiosk.  Her goal is to build a house.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs and to furnish the kiosk.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Creciendo Juntas Group

texts.es: Doña Edel es la presidenta de Banco Mujer Creciendo Juntas,  tiene 42 años, es madre de 5 hijos, 2 de ellos ya mayores de edad que no viven con ella,  los otros están en escuela y colegio, y un niño de apenas 2 meses de nacido. Los ingresos económicos de su familia son muy escasos, su esposo trabaja en una finca piñera, y lo que recibe de salario se hace insuficiente para cubrir los gastos básicos de su familia, por eso trabaja mucho, desde muy temprano se levanta para realizar las labores de porcicultura, lavar los chiqueros donde están los cerdos, darles de comer, así como sus labores domesticas,  luego se va a trabajar medio día a la cocina de la escuela de su comunidad,  y para cuando regresa también realiza labores de costuras. Todo esto para poder darle los estudios a sus hijos y ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos.  Este es el tercer crédito que solicita a Fundación Mujer, y en los créditos anteriores ella y sus compañeras de grupo han sido muy responsables y puntuales.  Edel es una mujer muy luchadora, que busca el bien para ella y su familia, y sabe que solo con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación puede lograrlo,  su mayor anhelo es mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y su familia, tener su negocio propio en la casa para ya no tener que salir a trabajar. Actualmente el banco está compuesto por 10 socias, y van a invertir en actividades agropecuarias, como siembra de plátano y otras hortalizas, cría de ganado y cerdos.
texts.en:
Edel is the President of the “Mujer Creciendo Juntas” communal bank.  She’s 42 years old and the mother of five children.  Two of them are already adults and no longer live with her and the others are in secondary and elementary school; she also has a new-born, two-month old son.

Family income is very low.  Her husband works for a pineapple plantation but his salary is insufficient to cover his family’s basic needs.  Because of this she works very hard.  Starting very early in the morning she rises to do the chores related to the pig farm: washing the pigsties where the pigs are and feeding them.  She also does the household chores.  Then she goes off to work half-days in the local school’s kitchen and when she returns home she also does sewing.  All of this is to be able to provide schooling for her children and to help her husband cover expenses.

This is the third loan she’s requested from Fundación Mujer.  In the previous loans she and her fellow group members have been very responsible and punctual.

Edel is a very determined woman who seeks her and her family’s wellbeing.  She knows that she can only reach it through much effort and dedication.  Her greatest wish is to improve her and her family’s quality of life, to have her own home-based business so as not to have to go out anymore.

The bank currently has ten members and they will invest in animal husbandry, banana and other vegetable farming, cattle and pig raising.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed concentrate.

loans.name: Gricelda María

texts.es:
La Señora. Gricelda es socia del banco comunal Buscando el Éxito, vive por un sector muy reconocido de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta  ciudad es encantadora por su mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su variedad en su gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños, su gente es muy cálida y amable, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Gricelda tiene 52 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 30, 29 y 15 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado e independiente, su segundo hijo trabaja solo para sus gastos personales y su ultima hija estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como agente vendedor, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 

La Señora. Gricelda labora en la venta de confites que ella misma fabrica, especialmente el maní de dulce, lleva dos años en el negocio y trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.
 
Este es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de azúcar y maní para la fabricación de su producto.
 
Su meta es de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Gricelda’s a member of the “Buscando el Éxito” (Seeking Success) communal bank.  She lives in a very well-known sector of the city of Cuenca.  This city is charming because of its mix of colonial and modern, its varied cuisine that captivates the palates of locals and foreigners alike, its warm and kind residents that maintain the culture and traditions of its peoples.

Gricelda is 52 years old, married and has three children who are 30, 29 and 15 years of age.  Her oldest son is married and independent; her second works just to cover his personal expenses and her youngest daughter goes to a local secondary school in the city.  Her husband works as a sales agent.  She does not own her house; she is a renter.

Gricelda works selling snacks that she prepares herself, especially caramel-coated peanuts.  She’s been in business two years and works Sunday to Sunday with no fixed schedule.

This is her second loan with the communal bank and she will use it to buy sugar and peanuts to make her product.  Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy sugar and peanuts.

loans.name: Nimia

texts.es: Nimia, de 27 años, es una mujer joven, alegre y emprendedora. Vive con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos de 8 y 6 años en su casa propia. Ella tiene a su cargo a su menor hermano de 15 años quien depende de ella para sus estudios y alimentación y es como un hijo más para ella, lo cría desde hace mucho tiempo. El trabajo de Nimia consiste en la venta de comida. Desde muy temprano sale en busca de verduras frescas y carne, que son la materia prima para preparar sus deliciosos platos, con los que tiene acostumbrado a sus fieles clientes. Inicio éste trabajo hace cuatro años a raíz de la necesidad de tener un ingresos extra en el hogar. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener tiempo disponible para realizar otras cosas en su hogar, le esta yendo muy bien, por ello lo considera muy rentable,  ya que gana casi el 50 % de su inversión, además esta en proceso de crecimiento ya que sus clientes aumentan cada vez más. Espera seguir creciendo ya que tiene en mente la apertura un restaurante. Este será el crédito numero 6 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos y crecimiento programado, además esta muy decidida a cumplir con sus pagos como lo hizo hasta hora en sus créditos anteriores. Le agrada mucho pertenecer a su grupo comunal. Con el monto solicitado, comprará ingredientes e insumos para seguir con la preparación de sus deliciosos platos.
texts.en:
Nimia, age 27, is a happy and enterprising young woman.  She lives with her life partner and their two children, ages eight and six, in her own house.  Her 15 year old brother is also under her care.  He is dependent upon her for his education and food, and he is like one child more for her.  She has been taking care of him for a long time.

Nimia’s work is selling food.  She leaves very early to look for fresh vegetables and meat.  Those are the main ingredients to make her delicious dishes, which her loyal customers are used to having.  She started this work four years ago because she needed to have extra income for the household.

What she likes about her work is that it allows her spare time to do other things in her house.  It is going very well for her.  She earns almost 50% of her investment.  Also, the business is in the process of growing because she gets more customers every day.  She hopes to continue growing because she has it in mind to open a restaurant.

This will be her sixth loan with the MFP institution.  She therefore hopes for their collaboration in order to continue with her objectives and for the growth that is planned.  Also, she is very determined to make her payment as she has done with her previous loans.  

It really pleases her to belong to her communal bank.  She will use the requested loan to buy ingredients and supplies to continue preparing her delicious dishes.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare food.

loans.name: Sania Yaset

texts.es:
Sania tiene 27 años, es casada, vive con su esposo y su hijo.
Ella tiene seis años de dedicarse a la venta de productos por catálogo.

Un día de trabajo para Sania,involucra salir a repartir catálogos, hacer nuevos clientes, entregar pedidos. Ella da un plazo de 15 días a sus clientes para el pago de los productos.Organizando el cobro cuatro días antes del vencimiento de sus facturas.

Es la primera vez que Sania solicita un crédito a una institución financiera,siempre ha trabajado con el crédito de sus proveedores y sus ahorros.

Ella ha solicitado un préstamo a Fundación Mujer, para aprovechar la temporada y vender mayores cantidades.
Con el préstamo ella comprará : zapatos, ropa de cama, ropa interior y artículos para el hogar.

En un futuro Sania espera tener estabilidad económica,para brindarle a su familia mejores comdiciones  de vida.
texts.en:
Sania is 27, married, and lives with her husband and son.
She has sold clothing through a catalogue for six years.

A typical workday for Sonia involves going out to distribute catalogues, find new clients, and deliver orders. She allows her clients a period of fifteen days to pay for the products, and she makes sure that this deadline occurs four days before she is billed.

This is the first time that Sania has requested a loan from a financial institution. She has always worked with credit from her suppliers and from her own savings.

She has requested a loan from Fundacion Mujer in order to take advantage of the season and sell in greater quantities.

With this loan, she will purchase: shoes, bedding, underwear, and home items.

For the future, Sania hopes to enjoy economic stability in order to offer her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy products, such as clothing, shoes, and home items, from a catalogue for re-sale.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es: El Sr. Fernando cuenta con una tienda de Abarrotes, la cual es su única fuente generadora de ingresos que le ayudan a subsistir , por tal motivo la única manera de mejorar su calidad de vida es surtir su pequeña tienda de abarrotes ya que por estar en un lugar estratégicos cuenta una elevada demanda por lo tanto hemos el cliente ha tenido la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para poder mejorar su negocio . Fernando es una persona muy emprendedora que desea que la gente confíe en el para poderles demostrar que puede responder de forma responsable.
texts.en:
Fernando owns a grocery store and it is his only generator of income to help him subsist. For that reason, the sole means of improving his quality of life is to resupply his small grocery store. Since it is in a strategic location, it can count on an elevated demand for what he stocks.

Fernando needs to request a loan to be able to improve his business. He is a very enterprising person who wants people to have confidence in him and he wishes to demonstrate that he can respond in a responsible way.

loans.use: to restock and improve his grocery store.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: Patricia, de 38 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy responsable, esta casada y es madre de dos hijos de 6 y 4 años, vive en una casa alquilada a lado de su esposo y sus dos menores hijos por quienes trabaja mucho para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. EL trabajo de Patricia consiste en la venta de productos, herramientas, ya que tiene una ferretería. Su negocio esta ubicada en el centro de la ciudad y es una zona muy concurrida, lleva recién tres meses con este negocio, tiene el respaldo y apoyo de su esposo con quien trabaja, como todo nuevo negocio aun esta entrando al mercado y espera poder crecer de a pocos para así tener el ansiado crecimiento que tanto desea. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que esta a lado de sus esposo y juntos trabajan muy bien. Le esta yendo bien ya que el movimiento es diario, no como quisiera pero al menos entra y sale los productos dejando ganancias. Espera poder consolidar su negocio y así poder crecer mucho más en su faceta de empresaria ferretera. Este será el segundo crédito con la MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con su objetivo, por otro lado se compromete una vez más en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos los integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarios. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería para surtir un poco más a su ferretería.
texts.en: Patricia, 38, is a friendly, responsible woman.  She and her husband have two children who are 6- and 4-years old, respectively.  They rent the house where they live.  Patricia works hard because she wants to give her family a better quality of life.  She owns her own hardware business.  The store is in the center of town, on a street with lots of traffic.  She started the business three months ago and can count on help from her husband because he also works at the store. The business is small, like most new businesses, but Patricia hopes to grow it over time.  So far, she's doing pretty well.  Not as well as she wants, perhaps, but merchandise is going out as fast as it's coming in and she's making money.  She hopes to consolidate her gains and firmly establish herself as a hardware merchant.  This is her second MFP loan and she's counting on your support.  For her part, she is committed to repaying this loan in the time agreed, just as she did her first loan.  She says, too, that she is happy with her community bank because the members are responsible and supportive.  Patricia will use this loan to buy merchandise to stock her hardware business.

loans.use: to stock her hardware store.

loans.name: Miriam Natalia

texts.es:
La Señorita. Miriam es socia del banco comunal Patys FLC, vive por la parroquia Tarqui en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió, sus grandes llanuras le hacen un lugar propicio para la cría de ganado y mas animales, su gente es de un corazón muy cálido y amable, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señorita. Miriam tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera y vive con sus padres, su papá  se dedican a la ganadería y su mamá atiende una tienda que tiene en su casa. La casa en la que habitan es de propiedad de sus padres.
 
Ella es profesional en la rama de la belleza y labora en un gabinete que es de su propiedad, trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace un año y esta pidiendo otro prestamo para invertir en màs productos para su negocio ya que tiene muchos clientes. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de  tintes de pelo, champú, esmaltes de uñas, tratamientos para el cabello, etc. que necesita en su gabinete.
 
Su meta es tener un Spa.
texts.en:
Miriam is a member of the Patys FLC community bank in Cuenca.  The great plains around the city are ideal for raising cattle and other livestock. The climate here is cold, but the people are warm and friendly.  Cultural traditions are important and local people work hard to maintain them.

Miriam, 20, is single and lives with her parents.  Her father raises cattle and her mother has her own store.  The house where they live is owned by her parents.  

Miriam has a beauty salon, a business that she operates in a small space at the house.  She works Mondays to Saturdays, from 8:00 in the morning to 7:00 in the evening.  

She has been a member of her community bank for a year.  She is applying for a loan so that she can buy beauty products that she will resell to her customers.  She wants to buy hair dyes, shampoo, nail polish and other similar products.

Her goal for the future is to own her own spa.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Marcia Patricia

texts.es:
La Señora. Marcia es socia del banco comunal Patys FLC, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde diciembre de 1999, su gente es de un corazón muy cálido, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, esta ciudad tiene una gran variedad en su gastronomía la cual cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.

Doña Marcia tiene 30 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos, su primer hijo tiene 11 años de edad y sus dos hijos quienes son gemelos tienen 7 años de edad, todos sus hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora conduciendo una  unidad de taxi, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad. 

La Señora. Marcia es profesional en el área de la belleza y labora en su gabinete el cual tiene hace 15 años, labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo. 

Es socia del banco comunal hace un año y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos de belleza para su local.

Su meta agrandar su local.
texts.en:
Marcia is a member of the Patys FLC community bank in Cuenca.  She lives on the outskirts of Cuenca, a city declared a World Heritage Site in 1999. The climate here is cold, but the people are warm and friendly.  The area is famous for its food and its commitment to the local culture.

Marcia, 30, is married and the mother of 3 children, an 11-year old boy and 7-year old twins.  The three children go to a local school.  Her husband is a taxi driver.  They own the house where they live.

Marcia has a beauty salon, a business that she has owned for 15 years.  She works Sundays to Sundays, whenever she has a customer.  

She has been a member of her community bank for a year and she will use this loan to buy beauty products that she will resell.

Her goal for the future is to expand her salon.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her beauty salon.

loans.name: María Teresa

texts.es:
La Señora María es socia del banco comunal Patys FLC, vive por la parroquia Tarqui en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió, sus grandes llanuras le hacen un lugar propicio para la cría de ganado y otros animales, su gente es de un corazón muy cálido y amable, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña María tiene 43 años, es casada y fruto de su unión ha concebido 6 hijos de 23, 20, 17, 15, 3 y 1 año de edad, sus dos primeros hijos trabajan solo para solventar sus gastos y dos de sus hijos estudian en el colegio. Su esposo labora en la ganadería, la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora. María se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y a la atención de su tienda, lleva trabajando en esta actividad hace 9 años, sin un horario fijo y de domingo a domingo. También cría cerdos, gallinas y cuyes.
 
Se encuentra en su segundo crédito en el  banco comunal y  lo va a invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para surtir más su tienda.
 
Su meta es agrandar su tienda.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the “Paty's FLC” communal bank. She lives in Tarqui parish in Cuenca. It has a cold climate and its great plains make an ideal place to raise cattle and other animals. Its people possess a warm and friendly heart; they maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.

Maria is 43 years old, married, and their union has conceived 6 children, aged 23, 20, 17, 15, 3 and 1. Their first 2 children work and cover their own expenses, while 2 of their children study in a local school. Her husband works in cattle raising. They own the house they live in.

Maria takes care of household matters and attends to her store. She has done this for some 9 years, without a fixed schedule, from Sunday to Sunday. In addition, she raised pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs.

This loan will start Maria on her 2nd loan cycle with her communal bank. She will invest it in purchasing products of primary necessity to restock her store.

Her goal is to expand the store.

loans.use: to buy products of primary necessity to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Flor Arllery

texts.es:
Arllery es casada, tiene 22 años, vive con su esposo, su hijo y su mamá.

Tenía dos años de vender sus productos, pero por problemas de liquidez tuvo que suspender su actividad.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Mujer, para reniciar nuevamente la venta de productos.Arllery comprará con el préstamo cosméticos, joyería, artículos para el hogar.Ella normalmente entrega los catálogos a las clientas para que estas realicen los pedidos,entrega y cobra cinco días después.Como ella trabaja con varios catálogos se dedica todos los días entre semana.

Arllery quiere salir adelante ,reiniciar su negocio e independizarse económicamente.
texts.en:
Arllery is married, 22 years old, and lives with her ​​husband, son and mother.

For 2 years, Arllery has been selling her products, but due to liquidity problems she had to suspend her business.  She is requesting a loan from Fundación Mujer (Foundation for Women) to renew selling products.  With the loan, Arllery will buy cosmetics, jewelry, and items for the home.  She usually delivers catalogs to clients in order to complete the orders.  She delivers and collects five days later.  As she works with various catalogs, she is devoted to working all weekdays.

Arllery wants to get ahead, restart her business and become financially independent.

loans.use: to purchase products such as cosmetics, jewelry, lingerie and more to sell by catalog.

loans.name: Bold

texts.en: Bold is 51 years old, and lives with his wife and three kids in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Bayanhongor province of Mongolia. His wife is a nurse, and all his children are college students. He started his car part retailing business in 2003 by renting a container in the market. Now, he has two containers and a larger range of products. Now that winter is approaching, car part demand is increasing. He is a sharp and hardworking man who says "college fees are increasing; therefore, I need to work even harder in order to support my children." He is requesting 2,000,000 MNT to buy supplies.

loans.use: To buy supplies.

loans.name: Gantulga

texts.en: Gantulga is 25 years old, and lives with his wife and daughter in a ger (Mongolian yurt) in Bayanhongor province, Mongolia. His wife is taking a kindergarden teacher training, and his daughter goes to the kindergarden. He started his meat retailing business in 2008. Now his meat products range has expanded and he sells flour as well. He is a sharp and hardworking man who says, "My goal is to support my family." He is requesting MNT 1,400,000 to buy meat before winter, when the price gets high.

loans.use: To buy meat before winter, when the price gets high.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is married with three children. She is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Julieta is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 30 years. She has requested a loan of 11,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer for rice. 

Julieta has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Julieta hopes to see her children finish college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for rice.

loans.name: Odonchimeg

texts.en:
Odonchimeg is 45 years old and lives with her husband and son in Bayanhongor province, Mongolia. Her husband is a head accountant in a local company and her son is a school student. She started her garment retailing business in 2008 by quitting her old job as a teacher in secondary school. Even though she is fairly new to the business, she is known for her high-quality and stylish clothes. 

Now that winter is approaching, she needs to sell warmer clothes. She is a bright and hardworking woman who says, "It is my mission to get my son educated." She is requesting 3,000,000 MNT to buy more garments.

loans.use: To buy more garments for resale.

loans.name: Pablita

texts.en:
Pablita is 56 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with six children. 

Pablita has a shop that sells bananas & coconuts. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy coconuts & bananas.

Pablita has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, Pablita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy coconuts & bananas.

loans.name: Analie

texts.en:
Analie is married with three children. She is 29 years old and lives in Tangub City.

Analie sells dried fish  to earn a living and has had this business for five years. Each month, she earns PHP 5,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 45,000 PHP to purchase more dried fish to sell.

Analie has been a member of PMPC for two years.

loans.use: to purchase more dried fish to sell.

location.town: Silangit, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental, Mindana

loans.name: Gertrudes

texts.en:
Gertrudes is 51 years old and lives in Looc, Maria, Siquijor. She is married with four children.

Gertrudes has a general store business and earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of work.  She has requested a loan amounting to PHP 7,000 to purchase more stock for her general store.

Gertrudes has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for six years. In the future, Gertrudes hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her rice field.

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is 56 years old and lives in Dipolog City. She is married with three children. 

Mercedita works in the fish industry and sells fish for a living. She has been doing this for 6 years. She has requested a loan of 14,500 PHP to purchase more fish to sell. 

Mercedita has been a member of PMPC for three years.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loans.name: Benigno

texts.en: Benigno is married with two children. He is sixty-three years old and lives in Molave, Zamboanga del Sur. Benigno runs a general store to earn a living and has had this business for five years. Each month, he earns P2,500 doing this business. He requested a loan of 35,000 PHP to purchase more stock for his general store. He has been a member of PMPC for more than two years. In the future, Benigno hopes that he can improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for his general store.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.en:
Candelaria is a mother of seven children. She is married and lives in Bintangan, Larena, Siquijor.

Candelaria is a farmer and is engaged in growing pigs to earn a living.  She has been doing this for two years.  She has requested a loan amounting to PHP 5,000 to buy feed and medicines for her piggery business.

Candelaria has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for one year.  In the future, Candelaria hopes to expand her business and have a savings deposit out of the profit from her business.

loans.use: To buy feed and medicines for her piggery business.

loans.name: Anonymous
