She pledges to continue paying in a punctual manner because she is very grateful.  Her manner of showing this is to make her payments punctually.  She will use the requested loan to buy more products for her stand.  Some of the things she will buy are bijao leaves, lemons, mangoes, and other seasonal products.

loans.use: to buy bijao leaves, lemons, mangoes, and products of the jungle region.

loans.name: Miriam Del Socorro

texts.es: Miriam Del Socorro tiene 50 años,  tiene cuatro hijos, los cuales aun son él 19 años depende de ella. Miriam se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general, pues quiere realizar este financiamiento para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, clavos, alfajillas entre otros. Ella siempre se esfuerza por mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda que es muy importante para ella y su familia.  Es una mujer trabajadora, honesta y responsable.
texts.en:
Miriam Del Socorro, age 50, has four children.  Only the 19 year old is still dependent upon her.

Miriam sells general merchandise.

She wants this loan to buy construction materials like zinc metal sheeting, wood for windows and doors, nails, and other materials.  She always endeavors to improve the condition of her house, which is very important to her and to her family.  She is a hard-working, honest, and responsible woman.

loans.use: to buy zinc metal sheeting, wood for windows and doors, nails, and other materials.

loans.name: Genesis 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Clara is the coordinator of her group, 'Genesis' 1 & 2. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and four children. She enjoys reading. She says that her most difficult challenge has always been to educate her children, because when a family is working hard to get money to survive, simple expenses become bigger efforts, like to buy school supplies or to improve their house structure.

Clara is excited to be taking her fourth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loans and grown her business. She has had her business for around 2 years. She was starting to use her savings to run her Comedor (small restaurant in the neighborhood, especially for lunch). After starting, she heard about Esperanza´s loans and decided to be part of the program. She plans to use this new loan to invest in her business by buying goods to prepare lunch, like rice, meat, cooking oil, vegetables and some cooking utensils. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business and she is dreaming of having her own restaurant in the town.

This group is compounded by 10 businesswomen dedicated to various business activities, from miscellaneous sales to food, beauty salons, shoe sales, fruits and vegetables, and others. They sell in their community and in nearby areas, located in the northeast of the city of Santo Domingo, where every day these micro-businesswomen look to improve their quality of life.

On behalf of her group, she thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, cooking oil, vegetables and some cooking utensils

loans.name: Margarita Yessill

texts.es:
La señorita Margarita tiene 21 años de edad y vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula en el departamento de Cortes. Margarita es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de 4 años. Los dos viven con la madre de Margarita. 

En los fines de semana, Margarita vende tamales y sopas. Ella ofrece una gran variedad de comida incluyendo tamales de pollo y de res, y sopas de pollo, res, caracol y marinera. Como complemento a la comida, también vende jugos naturales de nance (una fruta pequeña y amarilla de Honduras), mora, y otros sabores. 

Después de haber estudiado en una universidad pública de la región, Margarita no pudo encontrar trabajo. Pensando en su hijo, ella optó por vender comida para estar estable en su casa y dar más atención a su hijo. 

Ya tiene un año trabajando por si misma y ella nota que un desafío para su negocio es cuando los precios de insumos suben, porque ella tiene que aumentar el valor de su producto. Está solicitando un crédito de L10,000 para comprar carnes, condimentos, hojas para tamales, manteca, y una olla. Su meta es llegar a tener una franquicia de negocios. Sus esfuerzos están dedicados al negocio y ella espera que todo salga excelente. Ella quiere ofrecer a su hijo un bienestar y futuro seguro y darle una buena educación.
texts.en:
Señorita Margarita is 21 years old, and lives in the municipality of San Pedro Sula, in the department of Cortes.  Margarita is a single mother of a four-year-old son.  They both live with Margarita's mother.

On weekends, Margarita sells tamales and soup.  She offers a large variety of food for sale, including tamales made from chicken and beef, and different kinds of soup: chicken, beef, winkle and seafood.  To go with the food, she also sells natural juice made from nance (a small yellow fruit from Honduras), blackberry, and other flavors.

After studying at the region's public university, Margarita wasn't able to find work.  Thinking about her son, she decided to sell food so that she could work from home and give more attention to her son.  She has already been doing this work for a year, and she notes that one challenge for her business is when prices of raw ingredients rise, because then she has to increase the price of her products.

She is requesting a loan of L10,000 to purchase meat, spices, leaves for the tamales, butter and a cooking pot.  Her goal is to expand to have a franchise of businesses.  Her efforts are dedicated to her business, and she hopes that everything will move ahead wonderfully.  She wants to provide her son with well-being and a secure future, and to give him a good education.

loans.use: to purchase meat, spices, leaves for tamales, butter and a cooking pot.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es: Segundo, de 20 años, es una joven muy bueno, amable y muy trabajador. Es soltero ya que aún desea trabajar mucho para tener sus cosas y así recién poder tener un compromiso. Vive en casa de su madre en donde comparte sus días a lado de ella, su padre y sus hermanos quienes aún son menores y él apoya en algunas cosas. EL trabajo de Segundo consiste en el transporte de carga y pasajero dentro y fuera de la ciudad, de acuerdo  donde el cliente quiera ir, él esta dispuesto a llevarlo. Se siente muy feliz con su trabajo, ya que lo considera como un trabajo honrado, y sin tener que hacer cosas fuera de la ley. Lleva siendo Mototaxista ya por dos años aproximadamente. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que el dispone de su horario, y para tener un control de sus actividades él se pone metas. Como todo joven tiene muchos planes como el de comprarse un mototaxi más, ya que le permitirá tener ingresos adicionales. Este será el segundo crédito con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos, además se compromete en ser muy puntual en sus cuotas ya que en el banco al que pertenece los demás socios son muy responsables y él aprende de ellos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará piezas y accesorios para mejorar las condiciones de su mototaxi, además pagará al mecánico que le hará todo el trabajo que necesita su mototaxi.
texts.en:
20-year-old Segundo is a very nice, kind and hard-working young man.  He is single as he still wants to work a lot so that he can have things.  He lives in his mother's house where he spends his days with her, his father and his siblings.  His siblings are still young and he supports them in some things.  

Segundo's business is transporting cargo and passengers both inside and outside the city.  Wherever the customer wants to go, he is prepared to take them.  He feels very happy with his work as he considers it to be a decent job and it doesn't involve doing anything illegal.  He has been a motorcycle taxi driver for approximately two years now.  What he likes about his work is that he can set his own hours and, in order to be in control of his activities, he sets himself goals.  Like all young people, Segundo has many plans such as buying himself another motorcycle taxi which will allow him to make additional income.

This will be Segundo's second loan from MFP and he hopes to receive your cooperation so that he can continue reaching his goals.  For his part, he pledges to be very punctual in making his repayments as the members of his community bank are very responsible people and he learns from them.  Segundo will use the sum he has requested to buy spare parts and accessories to improve the condition of his motorcycle taxi.  He will also pay the mechanic to do all the work that needs doing on his motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to take his motorbike to the mechanic and to buy spare parts

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana; ella tiene 42 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de repuestos de carro, ella vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,ella vende llantas,motores,luces entre otros repuestos, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de repuestos de carro. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos de carro al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “MOSOQ ALLPA”. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Sra. Ana. She is 42 years old, married with 4 children. The member divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling car parts which she does from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.. She sells tyres, motors, lights and other spare parts. By means of this business the member takes care of her children. The member wants to expand and improve the business of selling spare parts for cars. The member is asking for a loan to buy car spare parts wholesale.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to make the repayments.

loans.use: to buy car spare parts wholesale.

loans.name: Silvana Alexandra

texts.es:
Silvana de 35 años, una mujer honrada y que a pesar de ser madre soltera ha podido salir adelante con sus hijos.
Su actividad es la venta de productos de belleza como cremas anti arrugas, base, delineador, etc.
Su actividad la realiza de lunes a domingos, en cualquier hora del día.
Su dificultad es la delincuencia de su zona, ya que al repartir sus productos se le hace complicado.
Tiene dos hijos uno 7 y 14 años, estudian en escuelas públicas.
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en su negocio y para surtir con otra clase de mercadería como ropa de hombre y de mujer, interiores.
Su anhelo es que sus hijos puedan terminar sus carreras escolares.
texts.en: Silvana is 35 years old. She is an honest woman and despite being a single mother, she has been able to get ahead with her children. She sells beauty products such as anti-wrinkle cream, foundation, eyeliner, etc. She works Mondays through Sundays, all hours of the day. The problem she faces is the crime in the neighbourhood which makes it difficult for her when she distributes her products. She has 2 children, one is 7 and the other 14 years old. They both attend public schools. She is asking for a loan to invest in her business and stock up on other types of merchandise such as ladies and men's clothing, underwear. Her desire is that her children be able to complete their school careers.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, eyeliner, etc.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.es: La señora Wilma nacida en Sanandita, Tarija es casada con el señor Félix con el cual tienen 3 hijos,  ella tiene 34 años, ellos viven en el km. 14 doble vía a la guardia, la señora Wilma se dedica a la venta de ropa de temporada  entre semana y los fines de semana se dedica a la venta de comidas, el crédito que solicita lo va a invertir en la compra de accesorios y actualización de  su computadora  para el uso de sus hijos, ella esta agradecida con ese préstamo y su deseo es el de ver a sus hijos profesionales.
texts.en: Señora Wilma was born in Sanandita, Tarija. She is married to Señor Félix with whom she has 3 children. She is 34 years old and they live at Km.14 of the highway to La Guardia. Señora Wilma sells seasonal clothing during the week and at the weekends she sells food. The loan she is requesting is to buy accessories and to upgrade her computer for use by her children. She is grateful for the loan and her wish is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy accessories and upgrading her computer.

loans.name: Marta Sonia

texts.es:
Doña Marta continua con su venta de ropa de segunda mano, la venta de mochila, bolsos, que junto a su esposo, atienden en un mercado de la capital, pues en esta inversion, ha venido creciendo ya que son aprecios accesibles y de buena de calidad. Captando clientes.
Con este nuevo financiamiento, podra comprar pacas mixtas, carteras, bolsos, muchila, acercandose ya la temporada buena en las ventas, y por tal razon quiere surtir mas.
Pues en este negocio, no se deja de vender, aunque sea poco, siendo el objetivo aumentar su inversion, obteniendo mejores utilidades, trabajando bien  su capital.
texts.en:
Doña Marta continues selling second-hand clothing. backpacks, handbags at a market in the capital together with her husband as her investment has been growing since their prices are reasonable and their products are of good quality. They attract customers.

With this new financing she will be able to buy mixed bales of clothing, wallets, handbags, backpacks, as the good sales season is approaching and for this reason she wants to stock more.

As in this business, one always sells even if only a little, the goal being to increase her investment, obtain better profits and put her working capital to good use.

loans.use: to buy mixed bales of clothing, bags, wallets and backpacks to increase her sales.

loans.name: Kelly

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Kelly; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de libros, ella tiene un local donde vende libros escolares, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia también se dedica a vender productos de belleza como perfumes, cremas y lápiz labiales, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de libros y negocio de venta de productos de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar libros al por mayor y también para comprar perfumes, cremas y lápiz labiales al por mayor. 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “MOSOQ ALLPA” communal bank, which is located in Cusco district, part of Cusco province and department.

Sra. Kelly is 40 years old and married with three children.  She divides her daily activities between two jobs. She has a shop where she sells school books from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. and she also sells beauty products such as perfume, face creams and lipstick. Through these businesses she is helping her children get ahead and she would like to expand and improve both of them. She is requesting a loan to purchase books as well as perfume, face cream and lipstick, wholesale.

Kelly is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy books wholesale as well as perfume, face cream and lipstick.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil, wire, pliers and outlets among other items.

loans.name: Joselyn Elizabeth

texts.es:
Joselyn de 19 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Guasmo”. Una joven emprendedora que quiere salir adelante con la ayuda de Dios. Tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento en su negocio, ya que el negocio de ella es la venta de cloro.

La dificultad de ella es que no tiene los ingredientes necesario para la elaboración del cloro. Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de ingredientes para su negocio como cloro, desinfectante, detergente en paquetes para venderlos por fundas y tambien confites para venderle a sus proveedores y para aumentar su negocio. Su sueño es buscar un local donde ella pueda comercializar su producto.
texts.en:
Joselyn, 19, lives in suburban area called “Guasmo”. She is a young entrepreneur who wants to get ahead with God’s help. She aspires to expand her business, which is selling cleaning products.

Her difficulty is that she does not have the necessary supply of cleaning products. She is requesting a loan to buy products for her business such as bleach, disinfectant and detergent by the case in order to sell them in packets. She will also purchase candy from suppliers to sell and thus expand her business. Her dream is to look for a shop where she can market her products.

loans.use: to buy products such as bleach, disinfectant and candy.

loans.name: María Juana

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Luz y Vida, vive por la comunidad del Aguacate en la ciudad de Cuenca, en este  lugar su gente es muy amable y de un corazón muy cálido, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, también laboran en la ciudad en distintas actividades.

La Señora. María tiene 68 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 8 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, casados e independientes, solo una hija viven en su casa con quien comparte los gastos del hogar. Su esposo labora como albañil, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad siendo el fruto del trabajo conyugal.

Doña María se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y como pasa en casa cría animales como ganado, cerdos, cuyes, gallinas y pavos los que vende y también son para su consumo.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 5 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de materiales de construcción para mejorar su casita.
 
Su sueño es viajar a los Estados Unidos.
texts.en:
Señora María is a member of the communal bank Luz y Vida. She lives in Aguacate in the city of la Cuenca, a place where the people are very kind and very warmhearted and maintain the culture and traditions of their forefathers. They raise animals and farm and also work in the city in diverse activities.

Señora María is 68 years old, married and has 8 children, all of which are adults, married and independent. Only one daughter lives at home with her and shares the household expenses. Her husband works as a bricklayer. The house she lives in is theirs, a product of the couple's hard work. 

Doña María takes care of the household chores and as she spends her time at home she raises animals such as cattle, pigs, guinea pigs, chickens and turkeys which are both for sale and home consumption.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 5 years and she will use her new loan to buy building materials to improve her small house.

Her dream is to travel to the United States.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Eugenio Felipe

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Eugenio Felipe; el tiene 42 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanía, el socio tiene un taller donde realiza trabajos de artesanía como Keros y otros trabajos en arcilla y luego lo reparte a las diferentes tiendas que venden artesanía en la ciudad de Cusco, el socio también trabaja en una empresa pública, por medio de este trabajo y este negocio el socio saca adelante a su hijo, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de artesanía. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer los trabajos de artesanía como arcilla y pinturas. 

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “MOSOQ ALLPA” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, in the province and department of Cuzco. 

This member's name is Eugenio Felipe. He is 42 years old, single and has 1 son. He alternates his daily activities with selling artesanal crafts. He has a workshop where he makes vases and other items out of clay. Later he delivers them to different stores in the city of Cuzco. He also has a job in public works. With that job and this business he is getting his son ahead. He wants to expand the business selling artesanal crafts. He is asking for the loan to buy materials to make the artesanal crafts, such as clay and paints.    

He is happy with the loan and committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to buy materials to make artesanal items, such as clay and paint.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Don Rigoberto  de 50 años, vive en Estelí, tiene 6 hijos. El es comerciante se dedica a la venta de herramientas, su negocio es una ferretería. El les da las gracias  cada inversionista de  Kiva  que  confiaron en el y lo apoyaron para que su negocio saliera adelante, el utilizo el primer préstamo para comprar llaves, clavos, cerraduras, válvulas ,cintas métricas, martillos , machetes, brochas, es decir abasteció su ferretería de herramientas útiles, necesarias para sus clientes , fue un cambio muy bueno para su negocio y los ingresos han sido  mejores que antes y sobre todo que pago en tiempo y forma,  está muy contento de poder acceder a los créditos que se dan de manera oportuna cuando mas lo necesita, ya que siempre se presentan las oportunidades de desarrollo. El requiere el segundo préstamo para comprar candados de todo tamaño, clavos, mangueras, botas de hule, abrigos impermeables, guantes para soldar, focos,   quiere ofrecer productos nuevos para a su clientela, el quiere en lo futuro vender materiales de construcción para que sus clientes encuentre en su ferretería de todo tipo de artículos para mejorar sus hogares.
texts.en: Don Rigoberto is 50 years old, lives in Esteli and has 6 children. He has a hardware store and sells tools. He thanks each and every Kiva investor who trusted and supported him so that his business could succeed. He used the 1st loan to buy keys, nails, locks, valves, measuring tapes, hammers, machetes, brushes. That is to say, he stocked his hardware store with useful tools, necessary for his clients. It was a good change for his business and the income has been better than before and more importantly payments have been on time. He is very happy to be able to access credit on a timely basis when needed, as there are always opportunities for growth. He wants the 2nd loan to buy locks of all sizes, nails, hoses, rubber boots, waterproof coats, welding gloves, light bulbs. He wants to offer new products to his customers. In the future he wants to sell building materials so that his customers can find all kinds of home improvement items in his hardware store.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for his hardware store.

loans.name: Blanca Eugenia

texts.es:
Blanca de 40 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Guasmo”.
Empezó el negocio de venta de bebidas, hacia 4 años ya que le gusta el comercio.
Su dificultad es la delincuencia ya que a ella le afecta muchos es la ventas.
Ella solicita el préstamo para el incremento de su negocio y para el alquiler de un local ya que la delincuencia no la deja trabajar.
texts.en: Blanca is 40 years old. She lives in a suburban area called “Guasmo”. She started her business selling beverages 4 years ago, since she likes being a merchant. Her problem is crime, since it really affects her sales. She is asking for the loan to grow her business and to rent a locale, since the crime doesn't allow her to work.

loans.use: to buy drinks, such as: water, sodas, juices, etc.

loans.name: Leticia Maria

texts.es:
Leticia de 40 años, una mujer trabajadora que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de su negocio.
Su actividad de venta de cosméticos la inicio hace 5 años.
Trabaja sola, tiene un hijo de 15 años, estudia en escuela pública.
Ella solicita el préstamo para el incremento de su negocio, y para la compra de mercadería como: perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, etc.
Su sueño es terminar su vivienda y que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en: Leticia is 40 years old. She is a hardworking woman who has aspirations of growing her business. She has been selling cosmetics for the last 5 years. She works alone. She has a 15 year old child who attends public school. She is asking for the loan to grow her business and to buy merchandise such as: perfumes, creams, deoderants, etc. Her dream is to finish building her house and that her business continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as perfumes, creams, deoderants, etc.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es: La señora Dolores, es nacida en la ciudad de Yacuiba, Ella se dedica a la producción de pan casero y empanas, y los comercializa en su mismo domicilio y también reparte a diferentes tiendas de su zona se dedica a esta actividad hace 3 años, la Sra. Dolores se levanta a tempranas horas de la mañana para elaborar sus productos,  tiene dos hijos, La señora demuestra ser una persona responsable y trabajadora, ahora el crédito otorgado a la señora es para compra de horno  que le facilitara el trabajo en el horneado de sus  panes y empanadas, el deseo de la Sra. es el de tener una pastelería y poder vender y entregar sus productos a muchos mas clientes.
texts.en: Señora Dolores was born in the city of Yacuiba. She is a baker and makes homemade bread and pies and sells them from her home. She also distributes them to different stores in her area. She has been doing this for 3 years. Sra. Dolores rises in the early hours of the morning to make her products. She has 2 children. Sra. Dolores has proved to be a responsible and hardworking person. With the loan provided, she will buy an oven which will make her job of baking bread and pies easier. Sra. Dolores' wish is to have a pastry shop and be able to sell and distribute her products to many more clients.

loans.use: to buy an oven.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, de 30 años de edad, soltero, de oficio agricultor, padre de un  niño e 9 años de edad,  habita  en la comunidad llamada la Lanilla en Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estelí,  en esta comunidad es donde se cosechan los mas frescos y verdes  pepinos de la región norte del país, la cosecha de hortalizas es una de las principales actividades que realizan la mayoría de sus habitantes. El se dedica a la siembra de  hortalizas desde muy pequeño ya que su padres  se dedicaban a lo mismo, el nos dice que la primer ves que sembró con su padre fue tomates, después, chiltoma y estando en su adolescencia comenzó a sembrar pepinos. Cuando cumplió 26 años de edad, sembró por cuenta propia , además de sembrar hortalizas, cultiva granos básicos como maíz y frijol que son sus segundos ingresos y lo ayudan cuan las ventas de hortalizas están bajas en los mercados , a el le gustaría que sus productos se dieran a conocer en los supermercados porque le pagarían mejor por su producto.  
El requiere el préstamo para sembrar1/2 manzana de pepino, comprar insumos, fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra, esta inversión le ayudara a cubrir los costos que genera sembrar pepino, además quiere sacar una producción con buenos rendimientos y calidad para venderla a un buen precio que le ayude a mejorar sus ingresos, ya que sus expectativas son ampliar las áreas de siembra, tener capacidad para sembrar mas hortalizas y producir mas. Además asegurarle un hogar digno a su hijo que esta estudiando su cuarto grado de primaria.
texts.en: 30-year-old Víctor is a farmer. He is single and has a 9-year-old son. He lives in a community called Lanilla, in Pueblo Nuevo, in Estelí. In this community, they harvest the freshest and greenest cucumbers in the northern region of the country. Harvesting vegetables is one of the main business activities in the region and most of the local people are engaged in it. Víctor has been growing vegetables since he was very young as his parents did the same work. He tells us that the first time he grew crops with his father it was tomatoes, then sweet peppers. During his teenage years, he started growing cucumbers. When he turned 26, he started growing independently. In addition to growing vegetables, he also grows basic grains such as corn and beans which make him a second income and help when vegetable sales are low in the markets. Víctor would like his products to become known in the supermarkets because they would pay him better for them. Víctor needs a loan so that he can sow half a manzana (one manzana = 1.68 acres) of land with cucumbers. He will buy supplies and fertilizers and pay laborers. This investment will help him to cover the costs that he incurs growing his cucumbers. He would also like to produce a good yield and high-quality crops so that he can sell them at a good price which will help him to improve his income. He hopes to expand the area over which he grows his crops, to have more capacity for growing more vegetables and to produce more. In addition, he would like to ensure that his son, who is in his fourth year of elementary school, has a decent home.

loans.use: to sow half a 'manzana' with cucumbers, buying supplies and fertilizers, and paying laborers

loans.name: Jose Cesar

texts.es:
Jose de 53 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Guasmo”, un hombre trabajador que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de negocio.
Su negocio es un vehículo de transporte público, escogió esta actividad ya que desde pequeño le gustaban los vehículos.
Esta actividad la realiza solo, la ejerce todos los días de la semana desde las 5:00am hasta las 22:00pm.
Su dificultad es la delincuencia y la competencia.
Está casado, su esposa lo ayuda a él con los pagos de su casa, trabaja vendiendo ropa.
Tiene hijos de 19, 22, 26, ellos ayudan a su papa económicamente.
El solicita el préstamo para la compra de llantas, radio, asientos y accesorios como la bocina del vehículo.
Su sueño es comprarse un vehículo nuevo y que a su familia no le falte nada
texts.en:
53-year-old José lives in a suburban area called 'Guasmo'.  He is a hard-working man who has aspirations to grow in his business.  His business is providing a public transport service with his vehicle.  He chose this business as he has always liked vehicles since he was a young boy.  He works every day of the week, from 5.00am to 10.00pm.  The difficulties he faces are crime and competition.  José is married and his wife helps him cover their household expenses by selling clothes.  He has three children, aged 19, 22 and 26, who help their father financially. 

José is requesting a loan to buy tires, a radio, seats and accessories such as a car horn.  His dreams are to buy a new vehicle and for his family not to want for anything.

loans.use: to buy tires, a radio and seats

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
José de 20 años, un hombre muy trabajador que a pesar de su edad quiere salir adelante siempre apoyando a su familia.

Es electricista, además vende productos de omnilife (productos naturales para mejorar el sistema humano), empezó esta actividad ya que también le gusta el comercio.

No está casado, tiene 2 hijos su edad son 2 y 7 años, el de siete años estudia en escuela pública. Para invertir en los productos de omnilife. Su sueño es construir su vivienda y incrementar sus productos.
texts.en:
20-year-old José is a very hard-working man who, in spite of his age, would like to get ahead in life and support his family.

José is an electrician and also sells Omnilife products (natural products for improving the human body).  He started this business as he also likes buying and selling.

José is not married but has two children aged 2 and 7.  His 7 year old attends school.  He is requesting this loan to invest in Omnilife products.  His dream is to build his home and increase his products.

loans.use: to buy Omnilife products made from fruit, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Luvina Clementina

texts.es:
La Señora. Luvina es socia del banco comunal Luz y Vida, vive por la comunidad del Aguacate en la ciudad de Cuenca, en este lugar su gente es muy amable y de un corazón muy cálido, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, también laboran en la ciudad en distintas actividades.

Doña Luvina tiene 50 años, es casada y ha concebido 11 hijos, uno de ellos es casado e  independiente, uno trabaja y ayuda en la economía del hogar, seis de sus hijos trabajan aportan a la economía del hogar y están estudiando en el colegio por la noche y sus tres últimos hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, su casa es propia.

La Señora. Luvina es comerciante ambulante, dedica a la venta de yogurt, queso y varios productos más como papas o lo que se encuentre de temporada y lleva 40 años en el negocio. En su casa cría ganado, cerdos y aves de corral.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 5 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir para compra de quesos, yogurt, papas, etc. para su negocio.
 
Su meta es aprender a conducir para comprarse un vehículo.
texts.en:
Luvina is a member of the 'Luz y Vida' (Light and Life) community bank.  She lives in Aguacate community, in the city of Cuenca.  The people here are very kind and have very warm hearts.  They maintain the culture and traditions of their parents and work in farming and livestock raising.  They also work in different activities in the city.

Luvina is 50 years old, married, and has conceived 11 children.  One of her children is married and independent, one works and helps with the household finances, six of her children work, contribute financially to the household and attend school in the evenings, and her three youngest children are attending  school in the city.  Luvina's husband farms and raises livestock.  They own their own home.

Luvina is a traveling saleswoman.  She sells yoghurt, cheese and several other products such as potatoes or whatever is in season.  She has been in this business for 40 years.  At home she raises cattle, pigs and farmyard birds.

Luvina has been a member of her community bank for five years and she will invest her new loan in buying cheese, yoghurt, potatoes, etc. for her business.  Her goal is to learn to drive and buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy cheese, yoghurt, potatoes, etc.

loans.name: Petita Beatriz

texts.es:
Petita de 55 años, vive en una suburbana llamada “Durán”.
La actividad de ella es una pequeña librería que está ubicado en la parte delantera de su vivienda.
Escogió esta actividad porque le gusta el comercio y la compra y venta de mercadería.
Su horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 7:00am hasta las 22:00pm.
Está casada, su esposo es jubilado y tiene tres hijas, ya todas son mayores de edad.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como cuaderno, plumas, marcadores, etc.
Su sueño es que su negocio aumente en mercadería y que incremente sus ventas.
texts.en: Petita is 55 years old and lives in a suburban area called 'Durán'.  Her business is a small stationery store which is located in the front part of her home.  She chose this business because she likes commerce and buying and selling merchandise.  She works from Monday to Sunday, from 7.00am to 10.00pm.  Petita is married, her husband is retired, and she has three daughters who are all adults.  She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as composition books, pens, markers, etc.  Her dream is to have more merchandise for her business and to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as composition books, pens, markers, etc.

loans.name: Estelvina

texts.es: La señora Estelvina, es una pequeña agricultora de la zona de Ticuantepe, habita junto a su esposo el cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ellos tienen hijos a su cargo actualmente, los planes hacia un futuro es poder mejorar las condiciones de vida, doña Estelvina desde hace varios años se dedica a la agricultura ahora ella esta innovando su plantacion con el cultivo de pitahaya la mayor afectación que se le presenta es que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para darle un mantenimiento agrícola adecuado  ya que la plantación carece de fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para una mejor cosecha , el cual le permitirá sacar un producto rico en sabor y a un mejor precio para su propios bienestar .Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atravez de los fondo Kiva .
texts.en:
Estelvina is a small farmer in the area of Ticuantepe. She lives with her husband who helps with the household expenses. They have children in their care. The plans for the future are to be able to improve their living conditions. 

Estelvina has for some years worked as a farmer but now is introducing her plantation to growing pitahaya [a night-blooming cereus, also known as pitaya, which produces a fruit commonly called dragon fruit]. Her major obstacle is that she does not have the funds necessary to give the required care of fertilizers and necessary farming supplies to have a good crop, which insures an end product rich in flavor and a higher market price, ensuring their wellbeing. 

She is grateful for the help given by Afodenic through Kiva funding.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and farming supplies

loans.name: Tello Enrique

texts.es:
Tello de 47 años, vive en una zona periurbana llamada “Isla trinitaria”. Su labor es brindar servicio de taxi, escogió esta actividad porque trabajaba en una cooperativa de Taxis, pero decidió independizarse.
Inicia su actividad desde muy temprano, y termina su labor a las 22:00pm, de lunes a domingos.

Su dificultad es cuando su vehículo se avería, es su única herramienta de trabajo. Está casado, su esposa es ama de Casa, tiene un hijo de 14 años, estudia en escuela pública. 

Solicita el préstamo para darle mantenimiento a su vehículo, ya que está un poco deteriorado. Su sueño es comprar otro vehículo en donde manejar sin ninguna dificultad.
texts.en:
Tello, forty-seven, lives in a periurban area called "Isla Trinitaria," and works as a taxi driver. He chose this business because he was working in a taxi co-op and decided to go out on his own.

He starts out very early in the morning and finishes up at 10PM, seven days a week. What's difficult for him is when the taxi breaks down; it's the one thing he needs for his job. 

Tello is married. His wife is a homemaker and he has a fourteen-year-old son who is in public school.  

Tello is seeking a loan so he can do maintenance on his vehicle because it's a little run down. He dream is to buy another vehicle that he can drive without any problems.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle and get tires.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: La señora Teodora vive en el Alto por la zona de Villa Ingavi se dedica a la venta de carne de pollo  su puesto es en un lugar estratégico de la ciudad de El Alto  es casada  tiene tres hijitos los dos ya van al colegio, su esposo es chofer el  crédito que solicito es para aumentar su capital de trabajo con la compra de carne de Pollo  por mayor ya que tiene mucha demanda de este producto, tiene muchos clientes y también entrega por mayor a las pensiones de la zona, la Sra. Teodora es una persona muy trabajadora y se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Señora Teodora lives in El Alto in the Villa Ingavi area.  She makes her living selling chicken.  Her stand is in a strategic spot in the city of El Alto.  Señora Teodora is married and has three kids, two of whom go to school.  Her husband is a driver.  The loan Señora Teodora is requesting is to increase her working capital with the purchase of whole-sale chicken.  There is a great demand for that product.  She has a lot of customers and also delivers whole-sale to the inns in the area. Señora Teodora is a very hard-working person and she feels grateful to the institution for the help they are offering.

loans.use: to purchase whole-sale chicken.

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es: Nelson Antonio tiene 30 años. Se dedica a venta de artesanía, tiene más 5 años en este negocio, Nelson tiene 2 hijos menores de edad bajo su cargo. Comenzó buscando una alternativa de cómo alimentar a su familia. Tiene ciertos clientes que le solicitan diferentes pedidos. Solicita el Crédito para comprar jarrones, hamacas entre otros productos. Los desafíos que se le presenta muy frecuentes son la competencia y la distancia que tiene que recorrer. El sueño de él es que sus hijos culminen sus estudios.
texts.en: Nelson Antonio is thirty years old. He sells crafts and has been in this business for more than five years. Nelson has two young children under his care. He began looking for an alternative way to feed his family. He has certain customers who make different requests of him. He's asking for a loan to buy vases and hammocks, among other products. His most frequent challenges are competition and the distances he has to travel. His dream is that his children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy vases and hammocks, among other products.

loans.name: Narcisa Yolanda

texts.es:
La Señora. Narcisa es socia del banco comunal Luz y Vida, vive por la comunidad del Aguacate en la ciudad de Cuenca, en este lugar su gente es muy amable y de un corazón muy cálido, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, también laboran en la ciudad en distintas actividades.

Doña Narcisa tiene 38 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos  de 19, 17, 14 años de edad que estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que habita es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Narcisa se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos por catálogo en sus tiempos libres y se encuentra en el negocio 3 años. También vende comida en su casa, lleva 4 años en este trabajo y labora de domingo a domingo.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 4 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa y cosméticos.
 
Su meta es tener un vehículo.
texts.en:
Narcisa is a member of the communal bank "Luz y Vida."  She lives in the community of Aguacate, in the city of Cuenca.  This is a place where the people are very friendly and warmhearted.  The people here maintain the culture and the traditions of their parents, and they work in a variety of activities, including agriculture and animal husbandry.

Narcisa is 38 years old, married, and has 3 children aged 19, 17 and 14, who attend a school in the city.  Her husband works in construction as a bricklayer.  They own the home that they live in.

Narcisa has been selling clothing and cosmetics through a catalog in her free time for 3 years. She has also been selling food from her house for 4 years, and she does this work on a daily basis.

She has been a member of her communal bank for 4 years, and she will invest this new loan in the purchase of clothing and cosmetics.

Her goal is to own a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta es socia del Banco Comunal “Santa Barbara” del distrito, provincia D. Yunguyo, departamento D. Puno, tiene  47  años D. edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos, dos independientes. Marta cuenta con estudios D. educación primaria.

Se dedica a la venta D. abarrotes, su primer préstamo fue por la suma D. S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invirtió en su negocio.

Solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma D. S/. 3000.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra D. 5 sacos D. arroz, azúcar, harina, fideos, huevo y aceite.  Ella trabaja junto con su esposo.
Nos cuenta que la mercadería la venD. en la localidad D. Juliaca.

Su sueño es continuar con el negocio y mejorar sus ingresos.

Lo que más le gusta D. su Banco Comunal  es la puntualidad y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
Marta is a member of the communal bank "Santa Barbara," in the district and province of Yunguyo, in the department of Puno.  She is 47 years old, married, and has 3 children, 2 of whom are independent.  Marta has an elementary school education.

Marta has a business selling groceries.  Her first loan was for the sum of 300 Peruvian soles, which she invested in her business.

She is requesting a new loan in the amount of 3,000 Peruvian soles to invest in the purchase of 5 sacks of rice, sugar, flour, noodles, eggs and cooking oil.  Her husband works with her in the business.

She tells us that she sells her merchandise in the town of Juliaca.

Her dream is to continue with her business and increase her income.

What she likes most about her communal bank is that the members are punctual with their payments, and she also likes the training.

loans.use: to purchase of 5 sacks of rice, sugar, flour, noodles, eggs and cooking oil.

loans.name: Angel Miguel

texts.es:
Ángel de 47 años, vive en una zona suburbana, un hombre trabajador y honrado en su negocio. 
Su negocio es la venta de Pallet, este actividad la heredo de su padre, su trabajo lo comparte con un ayudante.

Su horario es lunes a domingos, inicia a las 9:00am hasta las 16:00pm. Su dificultad es al cortar las maderas, ya que es una maquina con una gran sierra. El solicita el préstamo para la compra de maderas, clavos, martillos. Su sueño es que su taller tenga más operarios.
texts.en:
Ángel, age 47, lives in a suburban zone. He is a hard-working and respectable man.
He sells pallets of wood, a job that he inherited from his father. He shares the work with a helper.
Angel works every day of the week, from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm. His challenge is cutting the wood, since he uses a machine with a large saw. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of wood, nails and hammers. His dream is to have more workers in his workshop.

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, and hammers.
